net.hockeyapp.android
Class UpdateManager

java.lang.Object
  net.hockeyapp.android.UpdateManager

public class UpdateManager
extends Object

Description

The update manager sends version information to HockeyApp and shows an alert dialog if a new version was found.

Parameters:
activity - Parent activity.

                            String appIdentifier,
                            boolean isDialogRequired)
Registers new update manager.

Parameters:
activity - Parent activity.
appIdentifier - App ID of your app on HockeyApp.
isDialogRequired - Flag to indicate if a dialog must be shown when any update is available.
